text: {{Infobox football biography | name = Kyogo Furuhashi | image = | image_size = | caption = Currently playing for Scottish club Celtic | fullname = Kyogo Furuhashi | birth_date = | birth_place = Ikoma, Nara, Japan | death_date = | death_place = | height = | position = Forward | currentclub = Celtic F.C | clubnumber = | youthyears1 = 2010–2012 | youthclubs1 = Kokoku High School | youthyears2 = 2013–2016 | youthclubs2 = Chuo University | years1 = 2017–2018 | clubs1 = FC Gifu | caps1 = 68 | goals1 = 17 | years2 = 2018– | clubs2 = Vissel Kobe | caps2 = 74 | goals2 = 27 | totalcaps = 135 | totalgoals = 73 | nationalyears1 = 2019 | nationalteam1 = Japan | nationalcaps1 = 1 | nationalgoals1 = 0 | manageryears1 = | managerclubs1 = | medaltemplates = {{1x SPFL Top goal scorer 22/23 1x SPFL player of the year 3x SPFL Champion 21/22 22/23 23/24 2x Scottish league cup winner 2x Scottish cup winner 1x Japanese cup winner 1x Japanese super cup winner}} | club-update = end of the 2020 season | nationalteam-update = | years3 = 21/22 - present | clubs3 = Celtic F.C | goals3 = 42 | caps3 = 81 }} is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Furuhashi was born in Ikoma on January 20, 1995. After graduating from Chuo University, he joined J2 League club FC Gifu in 2017. He played many matches from first season. In August 2018, he moved to J1 League club Vissel Kobe. Vissel won the champions in 2019 Emperor's Cup which is first major title in the club history. On November 19, 2019, Furuhashi debuted for the Japan national team against Venezuela. ==Statistics== |- |2017||rowspan="2"|FC Gifu||rowspan="2"|J2 League||42||6||2||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||44||6 |- |2018||26||11||1||0||colspan="2"|-||colspan="2"|-||27||11 |- |2018||rowspan="4"|Vissel Kobe||rowspan="4"|J1 League||13||5||0||0||0||0||colspan="2"|-||13||5 |- |2019||31||10||5||2||1||0||colspan="2"|-||37||12 |- |2020||30||12||colspan="2"|-||1||0||7||3||38||15 |- |2021|||||||||||||||||||| 142||44||8||2||2||0||7||3||159||49 142||44||8||2||2||0||7||3||159||49 |} Japan National Football Team Database |- |2019||1||0 |- !Total||1||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Nara Prefecture Category:Japan international footballers Category:J1 League players Category:J2 League players Category:FC Gifu players Category:Vissel Kobe players
